QuestData.Title: Destroying the Competition
QuestData.Description:
One battle does not win the war, Commander.
That Transport isn't gonna hold up long against this Iron Horde navy. We are going to need another ship. Lucky for us, a local smuggler has supplied us with the plans we need to build Destroyers. We should construct one of these ships immediately!
QuestData.LogDescription: Construct a Destroyer in your Shipyard and send it on a naval mission.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is the status of the Destroyer?
QuestData.RewardText: They lured us into a trap, commander. I want revenge!

Objectives.Objective: Build a Destroyer at your Shipyard
Complete Naval Mission: A Little Combat
